nodes.text: The Ruisto system was a star system in the Calamari sector that contained the planet Ruisto.
Between 4400 and 4200 BBY, Ruisto was one of the first worlds colonized by the Mon Calamari outside their own star system.
In 4166 BBY, the Old Republic scouts made the first contacts with Mon Calamari starships near Ruisto during the expansion of the Perlemian Trade Route.
